author: carlson
msg: Updated Changes to include information about add id method in Hits

author: otis
msg: - Updated with information about changes that allow lock creation to be disabled.

author: otis
msg: - Added the ability to disable creation of locks on the file system, in order
to allow Lucene to be used on read-only media.
To disable lock creation set 'disableLocks' system property to 'true'.

author: carlson
msg: Added accessor method to get HitDoc global id from Hits.
This id needs to be used in sorting.

author: carlson
msg: Update .html files to reflect change in left nav bar. Otis added lucene-sandbox link.
